thread.title: Hearts of Oak fires Ghana FA warning over Kotoko appeal decision, set for court
thread.title_full: Hearts of Oak fires Ghana FA warning over Kotoko appeal decision, set for court

title: Hearts of Oak fires Ghana FA warning over Kotoko appeal decision, set for court
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 18:55 CET Hearts of Oak fires Ghana FA warning over Kotoko appeal decision, set for court - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghanaian giants Hearts of Oak have fired a warning at the Ghana Football Association (GFA) that they will head to the laws courts if the review committee does not restore their deducted points, a high ranking board member has warned. 
The former GFA boss says the decision by the Appeals Committee of the GFA restoring Kotokoâ€™s docked points will be met with the stiffest resistance if the Phobians are not handed the six points. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
